Name: Beko
Natural: The Beko 7kg 1200rpm Washing Machine features a Quick 28-minute program, ProSmart Inverter motor with a 10-year warranty, LED progress indicators, and slim depth design, ideal for energy-efficient everyday laundry.

Name: Hisense
Natural: The Hisense Series 7 Washer offers Auto Dosing, UV Hygiene, Auto Wash sensing, and ConnectLife smart features, combining stylish design with powerful cleaning and smart energy management.

Name: Zanussi
Natural: The Zanussi Top Loader Washer features a simple 30-min daily wash, FinishIn timing function, drum positioning for easy unloading, and quick-wash options, offering efficient, user-friendly laundry care.

Name: Hotpoint
Natural: The Hotpoint ActiveCare NM11 945 WC A UK N Washing Machine provides best-in-class stain removal at 20°C, Steam Hygiene, Stop&Add function, antimicrobial protection, and Rapid/Eco options for flexible washing.

Name: Haier
Natural: The Haier I-Pro Series 7 Washer Dryer offers a 10kg capacity, Direct Motion Motor, I-Refresh sanitizing steam function, antibacterial treatment, and automatic weight detection for superior hygiene and fabric care.

Name: Miele
Natural: Miele’s premium washers and dryers feature TwinDos automatic detergent dosing, QuickIntenseWash, heat-pump energy-saving dryers, WiFiConn@ct smart control, and endurance-tested longevity, ideal for high-performance homes.

Name: Bosch
Natural: The Bosch 500 Series Front Load Washer offers a 4.5 cu. ft. capacity with advanced washing features, providing efficient and reliable laundry performance for busy households.

Name: GE
Natural: The GE 5.0 cu. ft. Smart Front Load Washer features SmartDispense, UltraFresh Vent with OdorBlock, Steam Sanitize, and WiFi connectivity, designed for deep cleaning, freshness, and smart convenience.
